Full variable name: quality of the cut (Fair, Good, Very Good, Premium, Ideal)
Description: Describe cut quality of the diamond. Quality in increasing order Fair, Good, Very Good, Premium, Ideal

Full variable name: diamond colour, from J (worst) to D (best)
Description: Color of the diamond, with D being the best and J the worst

Full variable name: a measurement of how clear the diamond is (I1 (worst), SI2, SI1, VS2, VS1, VVS2, VVS1, IF (best))
Description: How obvious inclusions are within the diamond:(in order from best to worst, FL = flawless, I3= level 3 inclusions) FL,IF,

Full variable name: total depth percentage = z / mean(x, y) = 2 * z / (x + y)
Description: depth % :The height of a diamond, measured from the culet to the table, divided by its average girdle diameter

Full variable name: width of top of diamond relative to widest point
Description: table%: The width of the diamond's table expressed as a percentage of its average diameter
